bibl.title: A "Plaketten" Neck-Amphora with Twisted Handles.
bibl.note: Sydney, Nicholson Museum, Inv. 84.01. H. 43,8 cm. Provenience unknown (probably made by a migrant Athenian potter who worked in Alexandria), Early Hellenistic Period.

bibl.title: Classical Art in the Nicholson Museum, Sydney
